definition: to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to bring out the best in each other (idiom)/to complement one another well

sentences.english: The benefit from this, however, will be re-optimized rendering performance.
sentences.chinese: 这得益于然而，将重新优化渲染性能。

sentences.english: The gray-green walls, and the walls of fresh silver like box can complement each other.
sentences.chinese: 灰绿色的墙面清新宜人，墙上的银色像框相得益彰。

sentences.english: Evonik benefits specifically from its innovative prowess and integrated technology platforms.
sentences.chinese: 赢创的发展得益于其创新实力和一体化技术平台。

sentences.english: Golding's novels gain enormously from an understanding of his life.
sentences.chinese: 戈尔丁的小说很大程度得益于他对生活的理解。

sentences.english: Bret : These movies were indebted to the carnival and the freak show.
sentences.chinese: 此类电影应该算是得益于狂欢节及怪诞异常的表演。

sentences.english: Overall, the project proposed by Piercy Conner impressed the jury by its simplicity and lightness.
sentences.chinese: 就是得益于其设计的简洁性和轻便性。

sentences.english: Liuchi gets this from the education and instruction that he got from his parents in his childhood.
sentences.chinese: 刘驰的这一性格得益于小时候父母对他的教育和引导。

sentences.english: Although the training was really hard, it strengthened my will and Ive benefited a lot from it.
sentences.chinese: 尽管训练的确艰苦，但磨练了意志，我从中得益良多。

sentences.english: These benefit from the SOI Monocrystal silicon structure it possesses.
sentences.chinese: 这主要得益于它采用了单晶硅膜的SOI结构。

sentences.english: The terraces create an artificial landscape perfectly suited to a par 3.
sentences.chinese: 梯田创造的人工风景和三杆洞相得益彰。

sentences.english: These economic benefits were made possible in large part because both China and the United States embraced freer trade.
sentences.chinese: 这些高增产率得益于中美双方的自由贸易。

sentences.english: Both borders and day students benefit from the cultural diversity of CA's community.
sentences.chinese: 走读生和寄宿生都得益于学校社区的文化多样性。

sentences.english: What are the best methods and tools for getting the most from a scriptural study?
sentences.chinese: 从一次圣经研究中得益最多的方法和工具是什么呢？

sentences.english: Helped by Lady Feng, Lady Fan and the young scholar entered betrothal.
sentences.chinese: 得益于冯夫人，夫人范和青年学者进入订婚。
再问一遍，谁从中得益了？

sentences.english: The business community in China has also benefited from this long partnership.
sentences.chinese: 中国的企业界也得益于这种长期的合作关系。

definition: to give credit/to give sb his due/attribution
traceable to the same stock (idiom); of a common origin (of trends, ideas etc)
needless to say/it goes without saying
lit. like a tiger that has grown wings/with redoubled power (idiom)
to look favorably on sth/would be glad see it happen
